content: this is a very personal pattern in the sense that it was designed specifically for my baby and with specifics in mind maile is a fragrant vine endemic to hawaii and it is traditionally used as a kind of very special lei dave and i wore maile leis on our wedding day the lei is traditionally worn open draped over the shoulders and the leaf pattern in this sweater echoes that pattern available here 1 1 https //beacon by/nikki-van-de-car/maile
